description: A full open-source game with C++ source code, Wwise project, and companion documentation.

requirements.errorMessage: The SDL2 library is not detected. The Cube Demo for Mac requires SDL2 to be installed accordingly to the instructions at https://www.audiokinetic.com/library/${wwise_version}/?source=Cube&id=running_the_cube_demo#install_libSDL2_for_mac. Please restart the Wwise Launcher after the installation is complete.
